title: Explained: What is the Places of Worship Act, and what are its provisions? - The Indian Express
content:
1. Explained: What is the Places of Worship Act, and what are its provisions?  The Indian Express
  2. Exclusive: Places of Worship Act must be 'struck down', says Subramanian Swamy amid Gyanvapi Masjid row  Times Now
  3. Explained | Ayodhya, Gyanvapi row, and relevance of The Places of Worship Act  India Today
  4. Explained: The relevance of the Places of Worship Act ahead of the Gyanvapi Mosque case hearing in Supreme Court  Firstpost
  5. 'Natural to question judge's impartiality': Congress leader asks why local court ignored Places of Worship Act  Times Now
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Today, the Supreme Court will hear an appeal against the video survey of Varanasi's Gyanvapi mosque. A Muslim body says the survey violates a law enacted by Parliament in 1991. What is this law, and what has the Supreme Court said about it earlier?
